comments.author: AfterXII.2761
comments.body:
Elfo Bianco.3786:

Please add the “material” property too (Vibrant, Natural leather, Natural metallic)

There’s already properties for those values.

comments.author: Elfo Bianco.3786
comments.body: Please add the “material” property too (Vibrant, Natural leather, Natural metallic)

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Not within the next couple of weeks, but I’ll poke around and see if I can expose the rarity and set for the colors.

comments.author: fro.8967
comments.body: Are there any plans to add info such as rarity, set, etc., to the colors (or dyes) API in the near future? This would be helpful for sorting purposes with the new dyes API.
